ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder.HttpClient

  • public class HttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods for saving recipes, deleting recipes, and searching for recipes from webservice: http://cmput301.softwareprocess.es:8080/CMPUT301W13T07/ Majority of code from: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Searches for recipes based on titles.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • readImage

        public Bitmap readImage(java.lang.String filename)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns a single image.

      • readAllImages

        public Bitmap[] readAllImages(java.util.UUID uuid,
                     int numImages)
        Generates filenames based on UUID and number of images a recipe has, and returns all images corresponding with recipe.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID used for filename prefix.
        numImages - Number of images to look for, also suffix in filename.
        Returns:
        All images associated with requested recipe.
